description: Creates a connection notification for a specified VPC endpoint or VPC endpoint service. A connection notification notifies you of specific endpoint events. You must create an SNS topic to receive notifications. For more information, see Creating an Amazon SNS topic in the Amazon SNS Developer Guide. You can create a connection notification for interface endpoints only.

parameters.name: ConnectionNotificationArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the SNS topic for the notifications.

parameters.name: ConnectionEvents
parameters.description: The endpoint events for which to receive notifications. Valid values are Accept, Connect, Delete, and Reject. (string) ---

nested_items.name: ServiceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the endpoint service.

nested_items.name: VpcEndpointId
nested_items.description: The ID of the VPC endpoint.

nested_items.name: ConnectionNotificationArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the SNS topic for the notification.

nested_items.name: ConnectionEvents
nested_items.description: The events for the notification. Valid values are Accept, Connect, Delete, and Reject.

nested_items.name: ServiceRegion
nested_items.description: The Region for the endpoint service.

nested_items.name: ClientToken
nested_items.description: Unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request.
